body:
I tried by using `export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="/opt/magma/include;/opt/magma/lib"` before building or changing the build script to:

```bash
   CC=gcc-5 \
   CXX=g++-5 \
   WITH_CUDA=1 \
   CUDA_HOME=/opt/cuda \
   WITH_CUDNN=1 \
   CUDNN_LIB_DIR=/opt/cuda/lib64 \
   CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=/opt/cuda/include \
   CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="/opt/magma/include;/opt/magma/lib" \
   python setup.py build
```

Only sed-ing the FindMAGMA file works for me
